Feb. 24, 2018 D Oxfordshire & District BBA Winter Contest (Championship Section)
Oxfordshire & District BBA Winter Contest (Championship Section) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Winter Contest oxfordshire-district-bba-winter-contest--5607
None
Championship
Marlborough School, Woodstock, Oxfordshire, England, UK Marked according to the 'Mead mark sheet' scheme, i.e. sum of 10 categories of marks out of 10.
Best Instrumentalist: Euphonium, Brunel Brass
Special Prizes: Best Percussion of the day: Kidlington Concert Brass (Ben Varnam, Cameron Alsop, Melissa Brown, Kevin Hopkins) Best Bass Section of the day: Brunel Brass Best Cornet of the day: Kidlington Concert Brass (Tom James) Best Tenor Horn of the day: East London Brass
Dec. 5, 2017, 11:23 p.m. Feb. 25, 2018, 10:22 a.m.
1 Brunel Brass Neil Skipper Odyssey [Norbury]
2 East London Brass Jayne Murrill Odyssey [Norbury]
3 Kidlington Concert Brass Duncan Wilson Odyssey [Norbury]
